gameelements
Class GamePreferences

java.lang.Object
  gameelements.GamePreferences

public class GamePreferences
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds game preferences for the dimension of the board, types and names of the participating players, strategy settings, display options, and setup options for the board. These game preferences are used for both: console games and gui games.

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getNewGamePreferences

public static GamePreferences getNewGamePreferences()
Returns an individual set of game preferences, that is independent from the preferences used by the gui. This is used for individual console games, that have to be independent from the gui.

Returns:
a new instance of game preferences with default values.

getInstance

public static GamePreferences getInstance()
Returns the single available instance of game preferences used by the gui games. A first call will return an instance with default values.

Returns:
the instance of game prefernces as used by the gui.

isAnimatedSteps

public boolean isAnimatedSteps()
Returns true, if intermediate board situation, that occur while performing overflows, should be displayed. Returns false, if no intermediate board situations should be displayed.

Returns:
true, if gui should display intermediate board states.

setAnimatedSteps

public void setAnimatedSteps(boolean isAnimatedSteps)
Sets, whether intermediate board situations, that occur while performing overflows, should be displayed.

Parameters:
isAnimatedSteps - the boolean expr to set.
